code: import axios from"axios";var API_URL="http://localhost:8080/api/auth/";var head={headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}};export function login(username,password){return axios.post(API_URL+"signin",{username:username,password:password},{head:head}).then(function(response){if(response.data.token){localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(response.data));}return response.data;});}export function getCurrentUser(){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user'));}
